title: Worth the Wait
description: Inventor Henry Wallens accidentally made a time machine out of an old cell phone, and he's decided it's the perfect opportunity to make his life less lonely. He goes back in time and poses as his own uncle to try to make himself more outgoing... but when he runs into his old high school science teacher, Ryan, it's his current-future-self who ends up changing to look forward instead of back. A story from the Dreamspinner Press 2012 Daily Dose package "Time Is Eternity."
author: Lori Toland
